contentrichtext.text: '''Charles Blount''' may refer to: * [[Charles Blount, 5th Baron Mountjoy]] (1516–1544), English courtier and patron of learning * [[Charles Blount, 1st Earl of Devon]] (1563–1606), English courtier and soldier * [[Sir Charles Blount]] (1568–1600), son of Michael Blount * [[Charles Blount (deist)]] (1654–1693), British author and activist * Air Vice-Marshal [[Charles Hubert Boulby Blount]] (1893–1940), RAF officer and cricketer ==See also== * [[Charles Blunt (disambiguation)]] *[[Blount (surname)]] {{hndis|Blount, Charles}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Blount, Charles}}
